org.hedera.io.input

Class WikiFullRevisionJsonInputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.InputFormat<K,V>
      • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.input.FileInputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,FullRevision>
        • org.hedera.io.input.WikiFullRevisionJsonInputFormat

  • public class WikiFullRevisionJsonInputFormat
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.input.FileInputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,FullRevision>
    Provide a converter of Json revisions to FullRevision object The following code is inspired by the source code of Manning book, "Hadoop in Practice", source: https://github.com/alexholmes/hadoop-book
    Author:
    tuan, alexholmes
